trends: There have been 78 other sightings in Oklahoma City
There were no other sightings in Oklahoma City on or around March 23rd 2000
Summary: A bright red orange ball the size approx 5 ft in diameter, 200 ft in the air, 25 mph, NO sound.
divs: Sighting Details30 minutes before sundown, no wind, beautiful evening. I'm in my back yard working and i notice the object described as mentioned. It makes me laugh when highly educated scientists say they don't believe in UFO,s because they have never seen one. I have lived in the heart of tornado alley for 51 years and have never seen a tornado, does that mean they don't exist. Their is NO doubt in my mind that UFO's exist, how could they not exist considering the vastness of the universe. I have witnesses other events also, just wish i would have had a camera. The thing i don,t understand is the way i felt while watching the object that i described. I should have been excited, scared or emotional, but i just stood there and watched while it slowly went on its way, and went back to yard work, i thought about it working but that was all.
